text: Aveling is a surname, and may refer to: * Edward Aveling (1849–1898), British socialist *Eleanor Marx (1855 – 1898), sometimes called Eleanor Aveling * Francis Aveling (1875–1941), Canadian psychologist and Roman Catholic priest * Harry Aveling (born 1942), Australian scholar, translator and teacher * Martin Aveling (born 1982), wildlife artist * Thomas William Baxter Aveling (1815–1884), British Congregational minister * Valda Aveling (1920–2007), Australian pianist, harpsichordist and clavichordist
title: Aveling
